concept: Use std::string to index, slice, count, replace and modify characters in strings.

challenges.title: String Properties
challenges.description:
Given a string s, print:
1) the 3rd character,
2) the second-last character,
3) the first 5 characters,
4) all but the last 2 characters,
5) characters with even indices,
6) characters with odd indices,
7) the string in reverse,
8) every second character in reverse starting from the last,
9) the length of the string.
Each item must be printed on its own line.
examples:
Input:
abcdef

Output:
c
e
abcde
abcd
ace
bdf
fedcba
fdb
6

tests.expected:
c
e
abcde
abcd
ace
bdf
fedcba
fdb
6

challenges.title: Word Count
challenges.description: Given a line of text, count how many words it has. Words are separated by spaces (multiple spaces may appear).
examples:
Input:
Hello world from C++

Output:
4

challenges.title: Swap Two Words
challenges.description: Given a string that contains exactly two words separated by a single space, swap the words.
challenges.inputDescription: One line: two words separated by a space.
challenges.outputDescription: The two words in reversed order, separated by a single space.
examples:
Input:
hello world

Output:
world hello

challenges.title: First and Last f
challenges.description: Given a string, print the index of the first and the last occurrence of the letter 'f'. Indices are 0-based. If 'f' occurs only once, print its index once. If it does not occur, print nothing.
challenges.outputDescription: Either one or two integers separated by a space, or empty output.

challenges.title: Second Occurrence of f
challenges.description: Given a string, print the index of the second occurrence of 'f'. If the string contains 'f' only once, print -1; if it does not contain 'f', print -2.

challenges.title: Remove Between First and Last h
challenges.description: Given a string containing at least two 'h' characters, remove the first 'h', the last 'h' and all characters between them. Print the result.
challenges.inputDescription: One line: string s with at least two 'h'.

challenges.title: Reverse Between First and Last h
challenges.description: Given a string containing at least two 'h' characters, reverse the characters between the first and last 'h'. Keep all 'h' and other characters in place.
challenges.inputDescription: One line: string s with at least two 'h'.
challenges.outputDescription: New string with middle segment reversed.

challenges.title: Replace 1 With one
challenges.description: Given a string, replace every digit character '1' with the word "one".
examples:
Input:
I have 1 apple

Output:
I have one apple

challenges.title: Remove @ Characters
challenges.description: Given a string, remove all '@' characters from it and print the result.

challenges.title: Replace Middle h With H
challenges.description: Given a string with at least two 'h' characters, replace every 'h' between the first and last 'h' (not including them) with 'H'. The first and last 'h' remain lowercase.
challenges.inputDescription: One line: string s with at least two 'h'.
